      public boolean addPlayer(String id, String name)
      Description: This method creates a player and adds it to the player list of the game.
pre: players Player[] must be initialized
pos players Player[] is modified with the new player added.
      Parameters:
      id - String player identifier that cannot repeat
      name - String player name
      Returns:
      success boolean Whether the operation succeded or not

    • addLevel

      public boolean addLevel(double scoreLimit)
      Description: This method creates a level and adds it to the level list of the game.
pre: levels Level[] must be initialized
pos levels Level[] is modified with the new level added.
      Parameters:
      scoreLimit - double score needed to pass to the next level
      Returns:
      success boolean Whether the operation succeded or not

    • addEnemy

      public boolean addEnemy(String id, int type, double scoreAddition, double scoreSubstraction)
      Description: This method creates a enemy and adds it to the enemy list of the game.
pre: enemies Enemy[] must be initialized
pos enemies Enemy[] is modified with the new enemy added.
      Parameters:
      id - String enemy identifier that cannot be repeated in a level
      name - int index of the enemy types
      scoreAddition - double score that sums to the player if it is defeated
      scoreSubstraction - double score that substracts to the player when player loses
      Returns:
      success boolean Whether the operation succeded or not

    • addTreasure

      public boolean addTreasure(String name, String pictureUrl, double scoreAddition)
      Description: This method creates a treasure and adds it to the treasure list of the game.
pre: treasures Treasure[] must be initialized
pos treasures Treasure[] is modified with the new treasure added.
      Parameters:
      name - String treasure name, it can repeat in a level many times
      pictureUrl - String url of the treasure picture
      scoreAddition - double score that sums to the player if it is found
      Returns:
      success boolean Whether the operation succeded or not

pre: takenPositions int[][] must be initialized
pos takenPositions int[][] will be modified with the new postion
      Returns:
      newPosition int[] the new postiion that is not repeated

    • increasePlayerLevel

      public double increasePlayerLevel(String playerId, int levelId)
      Description: the method increases the level of a user only if user score is enough to do it, else will return the score necessary to increase the level.
pre: players Player[] must be initialized
pre: levels Level[] must be initialized
pos players Player[] player level of the selected player will be increased
      Parameters:
      playerId - String player identifier
      levelId - double the level that the user want tot get the new player to
      Returns:
      double It is -1 if the player is not found, 0 if the user level can be increased or a positive number that indicates how many points does the user need to pass
